body:
Within of the many to-come updates, today, along with Keys, Crates and Lottery, we are presenting the long-awaited voting rewards. This is very easy to do!

https://avicus.net/vote


Vote once per day at each of these links to win up to 250 credits or even temporary premium ranks! 

Have fun, and remember to vote!

title: [NEW] Vote for Avicus, get rewarded.

replies.body: Well The voting for credits thing is kinda useless. People are abusing it (you know who you are.) You see in purple, ______ just got 100 credits for voting 8 times..... Its kinda dumb because your supposed to vote once a day.
replies.body_tagged: Well The voting for credits thing is kinda useless. People are abusing it (you know who you are.) You see in purple, ______ just got 100 credits for voting 8 times..... Its kinda dumb because your supposed to vote once a day.

replies.body: You can't vote twice for the same person. If you change your IP and type your name after you voted, it will still say "You have already voted".

replies.body:
I am most likely the first person to discover this way of "abusing it". I guess I got other people to find out too how to do it (sorry) :P.
Though this glitch is not Avicus' fault, it's just minecraftforums being glitchy again. Every "extra" vote from this glitch DOES NOT give any user more credits than they are supposed to and these votes do not count as a true vote for the minecraftforums top server list, all it does is simply give a server broadcast about a fake vote. So please, to all the butthurt people, calm down. Just view as, I guess, a fun little way to chat with colored text. Minecraftforums will most likely fix this glitch very soon :)!



@OP - Love the voting system! :D
